      • scanNgramSet

        public void scanNgramSet(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ngramSet)
        Description copied from interface: VocabularyInterface
        Method parsing the given set of n-grams and, for each n-gram, listing its words and adding them to the vocabulary. The set of n-grams can come from the set of grams present in a NgramCountsInterface.
        Specified by:
        scanNgramSet in interface VocabularyInterface
        Parameters:
        ngramSet - the set of n-grams whose words to add to the vocabulary.
